casebody.data:
In re Mark KEY, Attorney. No. 209P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 30, 2007. David Johnson, for State Bar. Derrick C. Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 643 S.E.2d 444.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of April 2007 by Respondent for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of April 2007."
